metadata.name: Suspicious Query of MachineGUID
metadata.comment: Use of reg to get MachineGuid information

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\reg.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('software\\microsoft\\cryptography')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/v ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('machineguid')))

output.summary: Use of reg to get MachineGuid information
